original_text: and the two kidneys with the fat that is on them at the loins and the long lobe of the liver that he shall remove with the kidneys.
korean_text: 두 콩팥과 그 위의 기름 곧 허리 쪽에 있는 것과 간에 덮인 꺼풀을 콩팥과 함께 떼어낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the two kidneys with the fat that is on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들 위에 있는 기름과 함께 두 콩팥은

sentences.original_text: and the long lobe of the liver
that he shall remove with the kidneys
